script:
# script "lisp"
# fadein "black" 0.5
# background %(background)s
# bgmfile "bgm256" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# textflame 0 0
@
マスターは
天沼矛と
水族館にやってきた

# textflame 1 1
@天沼矛
お魚さん達が
ぐるぐる～ぐるぐる～♪

# textflame 1 1
@天沼矛
回遊魚のみなさんですねぇ
ぐるぐる～ぐるぐる～♪

# select "魚が好き？ " "select_label_01" "海が好き？" "select_label_02" "回るのが好き？" "select_label_03"
回遊魚のみなさんですねぇ
ぐるぐる～ぐるぐる～♪

# label "select_label_01"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_02"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_03"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# fadeout "black" 1.2
# waitandnext 2
